REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0857 reute b f BC-SAPPORO-BREWERIES-PLA 03-03 0051

TEXT.TITLE: SAPPORO BREWERIES PLANS 100 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Sapporo Breweries Ltd is launching a 100 mln Swiss franc, 4-5/8 pct, five-year guaranteed notes issue priced at 100-1/4 pct, lead manager Swiss Bank Corp said. The issue is guaranteed by Fuji Bank and payment date is March 17. REUTER
